title: Leader Rodgers in Defense of Hyde Amendment: “Be Warriors of Human Dignity”
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks in today’s markup defending the Hyde Amendment and upholding the dignity of all life.

title: Leader Rodgers: “This is Speaker Pelosi’s grand socialist agenda to destroy freedom.”
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks in today’s markup of the Democrat’s Build More Inflation Act, Speaker Pelosi’s grand socialist scheme to destroy freedom and embolden America’s enemies on the backs of American families.
